alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Jackson; Natchitoches; Sabine; Winn (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 23 at 7:25PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN JACKSON...CENTRAL NATCHITOCHES...SOUTHEASTERN BIENVILLE...EAST CENTRAL SABINE AND NORTHWESTERN WINN PARISHES THROUGH 800 PM CST... At 725 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking clusters of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 16 miles west of Jonesboro to near Campti to near Many. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Natchitoches, Jonesboro, Many, Campti, Provencal, Natchez, Clarence, Hodge, Goldonna, Saline, Robeline, Grand Ecore, Friendship, Flora, Black Lake, Chestnut, Clear Lake, Creston, and Hagewood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
